channel.title: awesome job
channel.description: I just finished playing through Black Mesa and wanted to tell ya I had a blast. This was done very well and I can't wait to see how Xen turns out.

item.title: awesome job
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Thankyou for your support, I will direct you to use this thread though.

item.title: awesome job
item.dc:creator: Dominus_Tempus
item.description:
I almost wanted to hold off from playing it until Xen was released, but that was a battle I’d have had no chance in winning.

Enjoyed it very much as well. I get that unexplainable feeling that games from many years ago used to give me. The kind of feeling that most games nowadays are incapable of delivering.

I, personally, call it incomplete until Xen is here. I have faith that it will turn out even better than what we’ve played so far.

Read full topic
